languages.text: "Взамен же им сотворил Омниссия новых духов машин и положил им судьбой служение, дабы помнили они предельность власти своей и не впадали в гордыню. Абсолютное же совершенство Деус Механикус избыл из вселенной, и не стало его".

"'In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus abolished it from the universe, and thus it was no more.'"
languages.original_text: "Взамен же им сотворил Омниссия новых духов машин и положил им судьбой служение, дабы помнили они предельность власти своей и не впадали в гордыню. Абсолютное же совершенство Деус Механикус избыл из вселенной, и не стало его".

traits.locale_text: "In their change the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them to serve so that they would remember limits of their power and did not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus wiped it out of the universe, and it was no more."

"In their change the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them to serve so that they would remember limits of their power and did not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus wiped it out of the universe, and it was no more."

"In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus wiped it off the face of the universe, thus it was no more."

"In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus wiped it off the face of the universe, thus it was no more."

"'In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus abolished it from the universe, and thus it was no more.'"

languages.text: “在这场变革之中，欧姆尼塞亚创造出了新的机魂，命令这些机魂受到奴役。这样一来，它们便会铭记力量的极限，不再会堕入傲慢的陷阱。至于终极的完美之物，万机之神将它从宇宙中彻底废除了，它也便不复存在。”
languages.original_text: "'In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus abolished it from the universe, and thus it was no more.'"

traits.locale_text: “在这场变革之中，欧姆尼塞亚创造出了新的机魂，命令这些机魂受到奴役。这样一来，它们便会铭记力量的极限，不再会堕入傲慢的陷阱。至于终极的完美之物，万机之神将它从宇宙中彻底废除了，它也便不复存在。”

languages.text: « Suite à cela, l'Omnimessie créa de nouveaux esprits de la machine et les destina à la servitude, afin qu'ils n'oublient plus les limites de leur pouvoir et ne sombrent jamais dans l'orgueil. Quant à la perfection suprême, le Deus Mechanicus l'a éradiquée de l'univers et elle n'existe donc plus. »
languages.original_text: "'In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus abolished it from the universe, and thus it was no more.'"

traits.locale_text: « Suite à cela, l'Omnimessie créa de nouveaux esprits de la machine et les destina à la servitude, afin qu'ils n'oublient plus les limites de leur pouvoir et ne sombrent jamais dans l'orgueil. Quant à la perfection suprême, le Deus Mechanicus l'a éradiquée de l'univers et elle n'existe donc plus. »

languages.text: "Nach ihrer Wandlung schuf der Omnissiah neue Maschinengeister und verdammte sie zur Knechtschaft, damit sie sich der Grenzen ihrer Macht bewusst und nicht in Hochmut verfallen würden. Der Deus Mechanicus tilgte die höchste Vollkommenheit aus dem Universum und sie hörte auf zu existieren.
languages.original_text: "'In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus abolished it from the universe, and thus it was no more.'"

traits.locale_text: "Nach ihrer Wandlung schuf der Omnissiah neue Maschinengeister und verdammte sie zur Knechtschaft, damit sie sich der Grenzen ihrer Macht bewusst und nicht in Hochmut verfallen würden. Der Deus Mechanicus tilgte die höchste Vollkommenheit aus dem Universum und sie hörte auf zu existieren.

"Nach ihrer Wandlung schuf der Omnissiah neue Maschinengeister und verdammte sie zur Knechtschaft, damit sie sich der Grenzen ihrer Macht bewusst und nicht in Hochmut verfallen würden. Der Deus Mechanicus tilgte die höchste Vollkommenheit vom Antlitz des Universums und so existierte sie nicht länger."

languages.text: «A cambio, el Omnissiah creó espíritus máquina nuevos y los destinó a la servidumbre para que recordaran que su poder tenía límites y no sucumbieran al orgullo. En cuanto al diseño perfecto, el Deus Mechanicus lo erradicó de la faz del universo y desapareció para siempre».
languages.original_text: "'In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus abolished it from the universe, and thus it was no more.'"

traits.locale_text: «A cambio, el Omnissiah creó espíritus máquina nuevos y los destinó a la servidumbre para que recordaran que su poder tenía límites y no sucumbieran al orgullo. En cuanto al diseño perfecto, el Deus Mechanicus lo erradicó de la faz del universo y desapareció para siempre».

languages.text: 「その変化の中で、万機神は新たな機械精霊を創造し、彼らを隷属の運命に置いた。力の限界を忘れず、慢心へと堕ちぬようにするためだ。究極の完全体については、デウス・メカニクスがそれを宇宙から抹消し、存在しなくなった」
languages.original_text: "'In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus abolished it from the universe, and thus it was no more.'"

traits.locale_text: 「その変化の中で、万機神は新たな機械精霊を創造し、彼らを隷属の運命に置いた。力の限界を忘れず、慢心へと堕ちぬようにするためだ。究極の完全体については、デウス・メカニクスがそれを宇宙から抹消し、存在しなくなった」

languages.text: "'Hermesih, yerlerine yeni makine ruhları yaratıp bunları hizmete mahkûm kıldı. Böylece güçlerinin sınırını bilecek, kibre teslim olmayacaklardı. Nihai mükemmeliyet ise Deus Mechanicus tarafından kâinattan kovulmuş ve böylece yok olmuştu.'"
languages.original_text: "'In their change, the Omnissiah created new machine spirits and destined them into servitude, so that they would remember the limits of their power and would not descend into pride. As for the ultimate perfection, the Deus Mechanicus abolished it from the universe, and thus it was no more.'"
